imdb.plot outline: When a blackbird goes down over Afghanistan, several U.S. soldiers are drifted apart. Some of the soldiers died, some were injured, and some were captured. Sgt.Daniel Brook, One of the few survivors left searches for any other survivors that may have survived the crash, but along the way he runs into many problems.
imdb.title: Drifted Apart
plot: When a blackbird goes down over Afghanistan, several U.S. soldiers are drifted apart. Some of the soldiers died, some were injured, and some were captured. Sgt.Daniel Brook, One of the few survivors left searches for any other survivors that may have survived the crash, but along the way he runs into many problems.
